column4: mouse cursors have never worked for me in any ubuntu, the normal state cursor never changes, only when hover cursor or in firefox etc.
i dunno if that's desired effect or what but in mac and win they changed in normal state
joooo is gone.  The mouse cursors usually appear if you disable compiz (not really an option in modern Unity)
